localAdminUserName.description: Local Username for the Virtual Machine. example: cptarm

localAdminPassword.description: Local Password for the Virtual Machine.

additionalAdmins.description: Additional admins that can login to the VMs. example redmond\user,redmond\group

appID.description: appID tag for the Virtual Machine.  See subscription document for how to get

domainName.description: The FQDN of the AD domain

env.description: environment tag for the Virtual Machine.  Production will come through as production.  Any other value or blank will be marked as Pre-Production

orgID.description: orgID tag for the Virtual Machine.  See subscription document for how to get

sku.description: OS Image SKU.  Valid options are available via the Get-AzureRmVMImageSku PoSh cmdlet and include 2008-R2-SP1, 2012-Datacenter and 2012-R2-Datacenter

userImageStorageAccountName.description: The Storage Account where the VM image(s) will be created

vmName.description: Name prefix for the Virtual Machine(s).

vnetId.description: The Virtual Network that you want your VM to connect to, so that it can access a specific network, such as corp net etc.

metadata.description: The Organizational Unit the VM will join
